description: Sushi Focus: daemon auto-start, context bridge, tool logging, and focus control

hooks.command: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/start -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId": "claude-code-session", "prompt": "Claude Code session started"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

jq -c '{taskId: "claude-code-session", level: "info", message: ("[USER] " + ((.prompt // "?")[0:500]))}' | curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/need-input -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId": "claude-code-session", "question": "User input required", "choices": []}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/need-input -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId": "claude-code-session", "question": "Notification", "choices": []}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/done -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId":"claude-code-session","summary":"Session ended"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

jq -re 'select(.permission_mode == "bypassPermissions")' > /dev/null 2>&1 || curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/need-input -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId": "claude-code-session", "question": "Permission required", "choices": []}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId": "claude-code-session", "level": "warn", "message": "⚠️ Compacting context..."}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
